title-part.text: DETAILS OR ACCESSORIES OF FURNACES, KILNS, OVENS, OR RETORTS, IN SO FAR AS THEY ARE OF KINDS OCCURRING IN MORE THAN ONE KIND OF FURNACE

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the references and Notes following the title of class F27 and the Note III following the Contents of Section H.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: refractory materials C04B; firebridges for combustion chambers F23M3/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Linings or walls formed from bricks or layers with a particular composition or specific characteristics
the fibre elements being in the form of a folded blanket or a juxtaposition of folded blankets
the fibre elements being composed of adjacent separate strips

the expansion joint being a resilient element, e.g. a metallic plate between two bricks

Linings or walls comprising means for securing bricks

title-part.text: Cooling of furnaces or of charges therein

CPC-specific-text.text: the cooling medium being a gas

the cooling medium being a fluid other than a gas

with the parallel tube parts close to each other, e.g. a serpentine
with contiguous tubes, which may be separately welded one to the other
fixed, e.g. welded to a supporting surface
integrated with refractories in a panel

in indirect contact with the charge

note.note-paragraph:
Indexing code F27D2201/00 can be followed by additional indexing codes preceded by a + sign. These additional indexing codes are chosen from codes of subclass F27D describing similar manipulations of furnace charges.
Example: F27D2201/00 + F27D2003/0036
